version_description:
Different times, different update:

We've made essential changes to the App to better serve Customers - we will be continuing to make changes in the coming days and weeks that provide clarity on how we will be operating.

Different times, different update:

We've made essential changes to the App to better serve Customers - we will be continuing to make changes in the coming days and weeks that provide clarity on how we will be operating.
Improvements have been made in the basket & checkout pages and transference of basket data between the two.
Improvements have been made in the basket & checkout pages and transference of basket data between the two.
Improvements to the product details pages and adding some extra Pride into our Apps. Love is Love
Improvements to the product details pages and adding some extra Pride into our Apps. Love is Love
Tweaks to the product details pages, making it easier to find the information you need on the page.
Tweaks to the product details pages, making it easier to find the information you need on the page.
We've added additional insurance options for certain products and fixed a bug around the Find Similar tool.
We've added additional insurance options for certain products and fixed a bug around the Find Similar tool.
Small, tiny, mostly unidentifiable and definitely uninteresting change made that annoyingly required us to issue an update. Better more useful stuff coming soon.
Small, tiny, mostly unidentifiable and definitely uninteresting change made that annoyingly required us to issue an update. Better more useful stuff coming soon.

Argos HQ has changed a bit recently, no longer are we seeing who has the biggest, most random collection of non-work-related nonsense accumulating on their desks. Or looking on in mystified wonder at that member of the team who is peeling 3lbs of carrots
